law.text: The District Court that has jurisdiction to grant administration of the estate of a person dying intestate shall have jurisdiction of proceedings to dispense with administration.
law.history: Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 391, effective January 2, 1978. -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 200, sec. 8. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3897-6.
